result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah Christopher Krieger

records.addlTxt: Court questions defendant. Court finds the defendant freely and knowingly waives his right to a preliminary hearing. Argument. Court reviews file-Finds probable cause.

9:30 AM Defendant Isaiah Christopher Krieger in court.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt in court for Isaiah Christopher Krieger.  Attorney Christian J Ness in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Atty Thomas-Schmidt states it will be a waiver.
Arraignment scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 03:45 pm.

$2500 Signature Bond. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription by a licensed physician. Not to consume or possess any alcohol. Maintain absolute sobriety. Not to enter an establishment that primarily sells alcohol for consumption on property.

1:00 PM Defendant Isaiah Christopher Krieger appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt appeared by video for Isaiah Christopher Krieger.  Attorney Christian J Ness in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances. Court addresses Thomas-Schmidt, makes statement. 381 Lawson Ave East, St Paul MN. 6124434711. Ness makes statement on bond, current signature bond, requests for cash component be ordered. Thomas-Schmidt makes statement, requests signature bond be reinstated. Court makes statement. Court orders $200 cash bond be set in addition to the $2500.00 signature bond. Same conditions apply.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:25 AM Defendant Isaiah Christopher Krieger not in court.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt in court for Isaiah Christopher Krieger.  Attorney Christian J Ness in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. No appearance by defendant. Atty Thomas-Schmidt has no information for the court. State requests warrant-granted.

10:19 AM Defendant Isaiah Christopher Krieger in court.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt in court for Isaiah Christopher Krieger.  Attorney Christian J Ness in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Waived reading. Waived time limits. Set for preliminary hearing-Defendant to appear in person. Bond to continue.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on September 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Absolute Sobriety-Not to possess any controlled substances unless prescribed.
Not to possess any drug paraphernalia. No contact with any drug users or dealers.

1:29 PM Defendant Isaiah C Krieger appeared by video, in custody. State appears by ADA Christian Ness. Attorney Gabe Pollak appears from the State Public Defenders Office. Court calls case and appearances. Court finds probable cause. Court questions defendant. Defendant's father offers address to the court. 

Current Address:
1980 Jefferson Ave.
St. Paul, MN 55105
#651-815-8009 (Mother's)
#612-443-4711 (Father's)

State requests signature bond. No objection from Atty Pollak. Set adopts State's recommendation.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
